sentence.Network_en: Verily I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我实在告诉你们，你们中间有一个人要卖我了。

sentence.Network_en: She pursed her lips together, as though fearing to betray her news.
sentence.Network_cn: 她闭紧双唇，仿佛害怕透露出她的消息。

sentence.Network_en: They offered me money if I would betray my associates.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们提出来只要我供出同伙就给我钱。

list.abs: 备战英语六... ... bluntly 指讲话坦白直率，不客气，也隐含不得体、不顾及他人感受等意味。 betray sb. 背叛某人 1. bald a. 秃顶的.
if soneone betrays you once , it is his fault ., 如果有人背叛你一次 , 那错在他.
you played me , betrayed me ., 你玩弄了我 , 背叛了我.
betrayal的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... n. 习惯用语 betray oneself 露出本来面目; 原形毕露 n. 出卖, 辜负, 暴露.
百度词典搜索_露 ... 露营[ camp;encamp] 露原形[ betray oneself;reveal one's true colors] 露止[ sleep in the open].

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from be- 'thoroughly' + obsolete tray 'betray', from Old French trair, based on Latin tradere 'hand over'

entry.def: If you betray someone who loves or trusts you, your actions hurt and disappoint them.

example.ex: When I tell someone I will not betray his confidence I keep my word...
example.tran: 如果我告诉某人我不会辜负他的信任，我就会恪守诺言。

example.ex: The President betrayed them when he went back on his promise not to raise taxes.
example.tran: 总统背叛了他们，违背了不加税的诺言。

entry.def: If someone betrays their country or their friends, they give information to an enemy, putting their country's  security or their friends' safety at risk.

example.ex: They offered me money if I would betray my associates...
example.tran: 他们提出来只要我供出同伙就给我钱。

example.ex: The group were informers, and they betrayed the plan to the Germans.
example.tran: 这帮人是告密者，他们把计划泄露给了德国人。

entry.def: If you betray an ideal or your principles, you say or do something which goes against those beliefs.

example.ex: We betray the ideals of our country when we support capital punishment.
example.tran: 如果我们支持死刑，那就背弃了我们立国的理念。

entry.def: If you betray a feeling or quality, you show it without intending to.

example.ex: She studied his face, but it betrayed nothing...
example.tran: 她仔细端详了一番他的脸，但什么也没有看出来。

example.ex: He nodded his head instead of saying anything where his voice might betray him.
example.tran: 他一言不发，只是点头，因为一开口可能会露出破绽。

means.word_mean: 2. deliver to an enemy by treachery;
3. disappoint, prove undependable to; abandon, forsake;

sentences.sentence: "His sense of smell failed him this time"
"His children failed him in the crisis"

means.word_mean: 4. be sexually unfaithful to one's partner in marriage;

sentences.sentence: "He told on his classmate who had cheated on the exam"

means.word_mean: 6. cause someone to believe an untruth;

sentences.sentence: "The insurance company deceived me when they told me they were covering my house"

auth_sentence.content: You felt you simply couldn't betray their hopes.
auth_sentence.res_content: You felt you simply couldn't betray their hopes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You felt you simply couldn't betray their hopes.

auth_sentence.content: It would have been dishonorable to betray her.
auth_sentence.res_content: It would have been dishonorable to betray her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It would have been dishonorable to betray her.

auth_sentence.content: To betray their master and debauch his army.
auth_sentence.res_content: To betray their master and debauch his army.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To betray their master and debauch his army.

sentences.en: He promised never to betray the organization.

means.word_mean: 泄露, 暴露, 表明

sentences.en: Her accent betrays her a Londoner.
sentences.cn: 她的口音说明她是伦敦人。

sentences.en: Her accent betrays her a Londoner.
sentences.cn: 她的口音说明她是伦敦人。

jushi.english: Her ethics would never allow her to betray a friend.
jushi.chinese: 她的伦理观不容许她背叛朋友。

jushi.english: He betrayed the secret by accident.
He had a good disguise, but as soon as he spoke he betrayed himself.
jushi.chinese: 他伪装得很好,但是他一说话就露了马脚。
